p.k: Ceci est une Rose by Julio Arozarena, with the Dancers from the Béjart Ballet Lausanne. Réalisateurs: Sonia Paramo (2018).
p.d:
Ceci est une Rose (This is a Rose) Choreography, Julio Arozarena With the dancers from the Béjart Ballet Lausanne Original Music live, Cytipercussions, JB. Meier Recorded music form pieces by W.A. Mozart, F. Chopin, C. Saint Saens, F. Schubert & Danzon cubain
With Clélia Mercier, Chiara Posca, Clara Boitet, Mattia Galiotto, Denovane Victorie, Jaym O'Esso Vito Pansini (Dancers from the Béjart Ballet Lausanne, Artistic Direction by Gil Roman)
Recorded on January 27th 2018 at the Théâtre de Cusset TV Direction, Sonia Paramo
